article.author: Linblad Expeditions
article.title: Antarctica with Lindblad Expeditions - You Deserve It!
article.lead: Ready for the adventure of a lifetime? Exploring Antarctica with Lindblad Expeditions is one of the most exhilarating adventures on Earth. Join us!
